name: Earch
text: Chris, whatever happens, the path of the angel will always remain open for you !

name: Earch
text: Keep in mind that even now, you're just one turn to the right away from getting back on track.

name: Earch
text: The truth you are about to discover will be hard to endure.

name: Earch
text: But if you get back on the right track, I assure that you'll be fine.

name: Earch
text: But it is your call, and I respect that..

name: Earch
text: Just please, take the time to think it through before continuing.
